overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active and engaging presence across multiple social media platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a combined follower count of 3580, his posts frequently engage audiences through discussions on disinformation, computational methods, and academic opportunities. LinkedIn shows the highest engagement, particularly with posts related to grants and hiring opportunities.

contentThemes.description: Posts related to studying and understanding disinformation across platforms.
Announcing grants, hiring, and research opportunities in academia.
Discussions and insights into computational methods for social media analysis.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts related to successful grants and research opportunities, as they show high engagement.
Consider cross-promoting high-engagement content from LinkedIn on other platforms to reach a broader audience.

platformInsights.mastodon: While engagement is moderate, posts about new research tools and methodologies receive a fair amount of interaction.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn is the most engaging platform with high interaction on posts related to grants and job opportunities.

Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
